QuestData.Title: Cenarion Tenacity
QuestData.Description: Those druids never give up, I swear. I'd given up on the Plaguelands years ago, but the Cenarion Circle folks keep telling me that the land is not beyond hope.$b$bThe most recent visitor was a night elf, on her way to the Fungal Vale, to the north. She told me that these lands will make a full recovery, if we try hard enough. I'm not sure I believe her.$b$bDo you buy this drivel? Maybe you and her should talk. She should still be up there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rayne near the entrance to the Fungal Vale.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Rayne near the entrance to the Fungal Vale in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: I suppose I had better work on my stealth, if you were able to find me.$b$bAre you interested in helping me heal the Plaguelands?
